questions.skill: Solve systems of linear equations using substitution or elimination
questions.question: If 2x + y = 10 and x - y = 2, what is the value of x?
questions.explanation: Add the two equations to eliminate y: (2x + y) + (x - y) = 10 + 2, giving 3x = 12, so x = 4. To verify: if x = 4, then from x - y = 2, y = 2. Check: 2(4) + 2 = 10 âœ“
